description: Generate time-based one-time passwords for two-factor authentication. Create codes on demand for accounts and services, ideal for automation and testing. Simplify secure logins and reduce reliance on external authenticator apps.

tools.name: generate_totp
tools.description: Generates a time-based one-time password (TOTP) using the provided or default secret key

digits.description: Number of digits in the TOTP code (default: 6)

secret.description: Base32 encoded secret key (optional, uses default if not provided)

algorithm.description: Hash algorithm (SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, default: SHA-1)

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp to generate TOTP for (optional, uses current time if not provided)
